name: Around the World in 8-Tea Days by M.O.D.E
name_original: Around the World in 8-Tea Days by M.O.D.E
description:
Play as a travelling tea sales-person, representing unique cultures through the craft of tea brewing.

Experience a journey to spread the love of tea to the people of the world. It takes only one cup to make someone smile.

Experiment with different ingredients to understand the process and what flavors work.

Reach sales goals to unlock new tea leaves and customize your boat interior!
